entry.title: India's Daughter, why and how to watch it
entry.content:
India's Daughter is a documentary portraying realities. Why is our government scared of it?

entry.title: I promoted myself to a first class citizen of the web
entry.content: This new year I gifted myself a promotion. From being just a number under facebook or any other web service, to being a first class citizen of the web. This website will be my identity. Read more at http://learnlearn.in/keep-in-touch
